info.title: CardanoBI API
info.description: A fully open-source Business Intelligence API for Cardano.

get.description: Returns useful information for all addresses.

400.description: Bad Request: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

401.description: Unauthorized: No valid API key provided.

404.description: Not Found: The requested resource cannot be found.

get.description: Returns useful information for one given payment address or all payment addresses linked to a given stake address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A payment address or a stake address

400.description: Bad Request: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

401.description: Unauthorized: No valid API key provided.

404.description: Not Found: The requested resource cannot be found.

get.description: Returns the history of blocks starting from the latest block.

parameters.name: block_no
parameters.description: Block number to search from - defaults to the latest known block

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: Number of blocks to return - defaults to 20 - max 100

400.description: Bad Request: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

401.description: Unauthorized: No valid API key provided.

404.description: Not Found: The requested resource cannot be found.

script_hash.description: The script hash in HEX form in case this address is locked by a script.

hash.description: The hash identifier of the block.

epoch_slot_no.description: The slot number within an epoch (resets to zero at the start of each epoch).

previous_id.description: The Block table index of the previous block.

slot_leader_id.description: The SlotLeader table index of the creator of this block.

size.description: The block size (in bytes). Note, this size value is not expected to be the same as the sum of the tx sizes due to the fact that txs being stored in segwit format and oddities in the CBOR encoding.

tx_count.description: The number of transactions in this block.

vrf_key.description: The VRF key of the creator of this block.

op_cert.description: The hash of the operational certificate of the block producer.

op_cert_counter.description: The value of the counter used to produce the operational certificate.

hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the block hash.

op_cert_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the block producer operational certificate's hash.

out_sum.description: The sum of the transaction output values (in Lovelace) in this epoch.

fees.description: The sum of the fees (in Lovelace) in this epoch.

tx_count.description: The number of transactions in this epoch.

blk_count.description: The number of blocks in this epoch.

epoch_no.description: The first epoch for which these parameters are valid.

min_fee_a.description: The 'a' parameter to calculate the minimum transaction fee.

min_fee_b.description: The 'b' parameter to calculate the minimum transaction fee.

max_bh_size.description: The maximum block header size (in bytes).

key_deposit.description: The amount (in Lovelace) require for a deposit to register a StakeAddress.

pool_deposit.description: The amount (in Lovelace) require for a deposit to register a stake pool.

max_epoch.description: The maximum number of epochs in the future that a pool retirement is allowed to be scheduled for.

optimal_pool_count.description: The optimal number of stake pools.

influence.description: The influence of the pledge on a stake pool's probability on minting a block.

decentralisation.description: The decentralisation parameter (1 fully centralised, 0 fully decentralised).

min_utxo_value.description: The minimum value of a UTxO entry.

nonce.description: The nonce value for this epoch.

cost_model_id.description: The CostModel table index for the params.

price_mem.description: The per word cost of script memory usage.

price_step.description: The cost of script execution step usage.

max_tx_ex_mem.description: The maximum number of execution memory allowed to be used in a single transaction.

max_tx_ex_steps.description: The maximum number of execution steps allowed to be used in a single transaction.

max_block_ex_mem.description: The maximum number of execution memory allowed to be used in a single block.

max_block_ex_steps.description: The maximum number of execution steps allowed to be used in a single block.

collateral_percent.description: The percentage of the txfee which must be provided as collateral when including non-native scripts.

max_collateral_inputs.description: The maximum number of collateral inputs allowed in a transaction.

block_id.description: The Block table index for the first block where these parameters are valid.

extra_entropy.description: The 32 byte string of extra random-ness to be added into the protocol's entropy pool.

coins_per_utxo_size.description: For Alonzo this is the cost per UTxO word. For Babbage and later per UTxO byte.

nonce_hex.description: The nonce value for this epoch in hexadecimal form.

pool_hash.description: The Bech32 encoding of the pool hash.

stake_address.description: The Bech32 encoded version of the stake address hash.

stake_address_script_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the script hash, in case this address is locked by a script.

quantity.description: The amount of the Multi Asset to mint (can be negative to "burn" assets).

policy_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the MultiAsset policy hash.

fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint for the MultiAsset.

epoch_no.description: The epoch for which this parameter proposal in intended to become active.

key.description: The hash of the crypto key used to sign this proposal.

min_fee_a.description: The 'a' parameter to calculate the minimum transaction fee.

min_fee_b.description: The 'b' parameter to calculate the minimum transaction fee.

max_bh_size.description: The maximum block header size (in bytes).

key_deposit.description: The amount (in Lovelace) require for a deposit to register a StakeAddress.

pool_deposit.description: The amount (in Lovelace) require for a deposit to register a stake pool.

max_epoch.description: The maximum number of epochs in the future that a pool retirement is allowed to be scheduled for.

optimal_pool_count.description: The optimal number of stake pools.

influence.description: The influence of the pledge on a stake pool's probability on minting a block.

decentralisation.description: The decentralisation parameter (1 fully centralised, 0 fully decentralised).

entropy.description: The 32 byte string of extra random-ness to be added into the protocol's entropy pool.

min_utxo_value.description: The minimum value of a UTxO entry.

cost_model_id.description: The CostModel table index for the proposal.

price_mem.description: The per word cost of script memory usage.

price_step.description: The cost of script execution step usage.

max_tx_ex_mem.description: The maximum number of execution memory allowed to be used in a single transaction.

max_tx_ex_steps.description: The maximum number of execution steps allowed to be used in a single transaction.

max_block_ex_mem.description: The maximum number of execution memory allowed to be used in a single block.

max_block_ex_steps.description: The maximum number of execution steps allowed to be used in a single block.

collateral_percent.description: The percentage of the txfee which must be provided as collateral when including non-native scripts.

max_collateral_inputs.description: The maximum number of collateral inputs allowed in a transaction.

registered_tx_id.description: The Tx table index for the transaction that contains this parameter proposal.

coins_per_utxo_size.description: For Alonzo this is the cost per UTxO word. For Babbage and later per UTxO byte. New in v13: Renamed from coins_per_utxo_word.

key_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the hash of the crypto key used to sign this proposal.

hash_raw.description: The raw bytes of the pool hash.

view.description: The Bech32 encoding of the pool hash.

hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the pool hash.

id.description: The pool metadata ref unique identifier.

pool_id.description: The PoolHash table index of the pool for this reference.

url.description: The URL for the location of the off-chain data.

hash.description: The expected hash for the off-chain data.

registered_tx_id.description: The Tx table index of the transaction in which provided this metadata reference.

hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the expected hash.

id.description: The pool offline data unique identifier.

pool_id.description: The PoolHash table index for the pool this offline data refers.

ticker_name.description: The pool's ticker name (as many as 5 characters).

hash.description: The hash of the offline data.

bytes.description: The raw bytes of the payload.

pmr_id.description: The PoolMetadataRef table index for this offline data.

hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the offline data hash.

ticker_name.description: The pool's ticker name (as many as 5 characters).

url.description: The URL for the location of the off-chain data.

hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the offline data hash.

id.description: The pool offline fetch error unique identifier.

pool_id.description: The PoolHash table index for the pool this offline fetch error refers.

fetch_time.description: The UTC time stamp of the error.

pmr_id.description: The PoolMetadataRef table index for this offline data.

update_id.description: The PoolUpdate table index this PoolRelay entry refers to.

ipv4.description: The IPv4 address of the relay.

ipv6.description: The IPv6 address of the relay.

dns_name.description: The DNS name of the relay.

dns_srv_name.description: The DNS service name of the relay.

ipv4.description: The IPv4 address of the relay.

ipv6.description: The IPv6 address of the relay.

dns_name.description: The DNS name of the relay.

dns_srv_name.description: The DNS service name of the relay.

pool_hash.description: The Bech32 encoding of the pool hash.

hash_id.description: The PoolHash table index of the pool this update refers to.

cert_index.description: The index of this pool update within the certificates of this transaction.

vrf_key_hash.description: The hash of the pool's VRF key.

pledge.description: The amount (in Lovelace) the pool owner pledges to the pool.

active_epoch_no.description: The epoch number where this update becomes active.

meta_id.description: The PoolMetadataRef table index this pool update refers to.

margin.description: The margin (as a percentage) this pool charges.

fixed_cost.description: The fixed per epoch fee (in ADA) this pool charges.

registered_tx_id.description: The Tx table index of the transaction in which provided this pool update.

reward_addr_id.description: The StakeAddress table index of this pool's rewards address. New in v13: Replaced reward_addr.

vrf_key_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the VRF key hash.

unit_mem.description: The budget in Memory to run a script.

unit_steps.description: The budget in Cpu steps to run a script.

fee.description: The budget in fees to run a script. The fees depend on the ExUnits and the current prices. Is null when --disable-ledger is enabled. New in v13: became nullable.

purpose.description: What kind of validation this redeemer is used for. It can be one of 'spend', 'mint', 'cert', 'reward'.

index.description: The index of the redeemer pointer in the transaction.

script_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the script hash this redeemer is used for.

hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the Plutus Data hash.

data_json.description: The actual Plutus data in JSON format (detailed schema)

data_cbor.description: The actual Plutus data in CBOR format

hash.description: The hash identifier of the transaction.

block_id.description: The Block table index of the block that contains this transaction.

block_index.description: The index of this transaction with the block (zero based).

out_sum.description: The sum of the transaction outputs (in Lovelace).

fee.description: The fees paid for this transaction.

deposit.description: Deposit (or deposit refund) in this transaction. Deposits are positive, refunds negative.

size.description: The size of the transaction in bytes.

invalid_before.description: Transaction in invalid before this slot number.

invalid_hereafter.description: Transaction in invalid at or after this slot number.

valid_contract.description: False if the contract is invalid. True if the contract is valid or there is no contract.

script_size.description: The sum of the script sizes (in bytes) of scripts in the transaction.

hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the hash identifier of the transaction.

value.description: The Lovelace or Multi Asset denominated value of this input/output.

unit.description: Lovelace or name of the Multi Asset denominating this value.

asset_fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint for the Multi Asset.

tx_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the hash identifier of the transaction.

block_index.description: The index of this transaction with the block (zero based).

out_sum.description: The sum of the transaction outputs (in Lovelace).

fee.description: The fees paid for this transaction.

deposit.description: Deposit (or deposit refund) in this transaction. Deposits are positive, refunds negative.

size.description: The size of the transaction in bytes.

invalid_before.description: Transaction in invalid before this slot number.

invalid_hereafter.description: Transaction in invalid at or after this slot number.

valid_contract.description: False if the contract is invalid. True if the contract is valid or there is no contract.

script_size.description: The sum of the script sizes (in bytes) of scripts in the transaction.

output_amounts.description: The list of transaction output amounts.

inputCount.description: The count of inputs in this transaction.

outputCount.description: The count of outputs in this transaction.

withdrawalCount.description: The count of withdrawals from a reward account in this transaction.

assetMintCount.description: The count of Multi-Asset mint events in this transaction.

metadataCount.description: The count of metadata attached to this transaction.

stakeRegistrationCount.description: The count of stake address registration in this transaction.

stakeDeregistrationCount.description: The count of stake address deregistration in this transaction.

delegationCount.description: The count of delegation from a stake address to a stake pool in this transaction.

treasuryCount.description: The count of payments from the treasury to a stake address in this transaction.

reserveCount.description: The count of payments from the reserves to a stake address in this transaction.

potTransferCount.description: The count of transfers between the reserves pot and the treasury pot in this transaction.

paramProposalCount.description: The count of Cardano parameter change proposals in this transaction.

poolRetireCount.description: The count of pool retirement notifications in this transaction.

poolUpdateCount.description: The count of on-chain pool updates in this transaction.

redeemerCount.description: The count of redeemers in this transaction.

output_index.description: The index of this transaction output within the transaction.

address.description: The human readable encoding of the input address. Will be Base58 for Byron era addresses and Bech32 for Shelley era.

tx_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the hash identifier of the transaction.

is_collateral.description: Flag which shows if this input is a collateral consumed in case of a script validation failure.

is_reference.description: Flag which shows if this input is a reference transaction input.

data_hash.description: The hash of the transaction output datum. (NULL for Txs without scripts).

inline_datum_cbor.description: The actual datum data in CBOR format.

reference_script_hash.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the hash of the reference script of the input.

key.description: The metadata key (a Word64/unsigned 64 bit number).

json.description: The JSON payload if it can be decoded as JSON.

output_index.description: The index of this transaction output within the transaction.

address.description: The human readable encoding of the output address. Will be Base58 for Byron era addresses and Bech32 for Shelley era.

tx_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the hash identifier of the transaction.

is_collateral.description: Flag which shows if this output is a collateral output.

data_hash.description: The hash of the transaction output datum. (NULL for Txs without scripts).

inline_datum_cbor.description: The actual datum data in CBOR format.

reference_script_hash.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the hash of the reference script of the output.

cert_index.description: The index of this pool retirement within the certificates of this transaction.

pool_hash_bech32.description: The Bech32 encoding of the pool hash.

pool_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the pool hash.

retiring_epoch.description: The epoch where this pool retires.

cert_index.description: The index of this delegation within the certificates of this transaction.

active_epoch_no.description: The epoch number where this delegation becomes active.

stake_address.description: The Bech32 encoded version of the stake address.

pool_hash_bech32.description: The Bech32 encoding of the pool hash.

pool_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the pool hash.

cert_index.description: The index of this stake registration within the certificates of this transaction.

epoch_no.description: The epoch in which the registration took place.

stake_address.description: The Bech32 encoded version of the stake address.

script_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the script hash, in case this address is locked by a script.

is_registration.description: True if the transaction is a registration, False if it is a deregistration.

stake_address.description: The Bech32 encoded version of the stake address.

redeemer_id.description: The Redeemer table index that is related with this withdrawal.

cert_index.description: The index of this payment certificate within the certificates of this transaction.

stake_address.description: The Bech32 encoded version of the stake address.

cert_index.description: The index of this pool update within the certificates of this transaction.

pool_hash_bech32.description: The Bech32 encoding of the pool hash.

pool_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the pool hash.

vrf_key_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the VRF key hash.

reward_addr_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the pool reward address hash.

pledge.description: The amount (in Lovelace) the pool owner pledges to the pool.

margin.description: The margin (as a percentage) this pool charges.

fixed_cost.description: The fixed per epoch fee (in ADA) this pool charges.

active_epoch_no.description: The epoch number where this update becomes active.

owners_addresses.description: The list of pool owners stake addresses.

tx_hash_hex.description: The hexadecimal encoding of the hash identifier of the transaction.

block_index.description: The index of this transaction with the block (zero based).

out_sum.description: The sum of the transaction outputs (in Lovelace).

fee.description: The fees paid for this transaction.

deposit.description: Deposit (or deposit refund) in this transaction. Deposits are positive, refunds negative.

size.description: The size of the transaction in bytes.

invalid_before.description: Transaction in invalid before this slot number.

invalid_hereafter.description: Transaction in invalid at or after this slot number.

valid_contract.description: False if the contract is invalid. True if the contract is valid or there is no contract.

script_size.description: The sum of the script sizes (in bytes) of scripts in the transaction.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme.
